thread.title: Proud Parents! Sanjay Dutt and Maanayata's kids Shahraan and Iqra win medals in school
thread.title_full: Proud Parents! Sanjay Dutt and Maanayata's kids Shahraan and Iqra win medals in school - Entertainment

author: The Hitlist Team
title: Proud Parents! Sanjay Dutt and Maanayata's kids Shahraan and Iqra win medals in school
text:
Sanjay Dutt 
It's time for double celebrations in the Dutt household. Sanjay has finally started shooting for his comeback Bhoomi, almost a year after he was freed from ail. Meanwhile, his children Shahraan and Iqra made him and wife Maanayata proud by winning medals at their school's annual sports competition held recently.

The kids won medals in the 50 and 75-metre runs as well as in the 300-metre relay. Dutt juniors seem to be good sprinters in the making.
